title: Monster Farm: Legend e no Michi
synopsis: Genki is a boy who loves playing video games. One day he's zapped into the world of Monster Rancher and meets the girl Holly and the monsters Mochi, Suezo, Golem, Tiger and Hare. Continuing from where the original story left off, Genki and friends journey to conquer the legend cup in hopes of freeing Holly's father from the mystery disc. (Source: AniDB)

details.Japanese: モンスターファーム～伝説[レジェンド]への道～

title: Lupin the Third: Mine Fujiko to Iu Onna
synopsis: Many people are falling prey to a suspicious new religion. Lupin III infiltrates this group, hoping to steal the treasure their leader keeps hidden. There he lays eyes on the beautiful, bewitching woman who has the leader enthralled. This is the story of how fashionable female thief Fujiko Mine first met Lupin III, the greatest thief of his generation. (Source: ANN)
background: Winner of the New Face Award on the 16th Japan Media Arts Festival.

details.English: Lupin the Third, The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
details.Synonyms: Lupin the Third: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine, Lupin III, Lupin III~Mine Fujiko to Iu Onna~
details.Japanese: LUPIN the Third ～峰不二子という女～

title: Himitsukessha Taka no Tsume Gaiden: Mukashi no Yoshida-kun
synopsis: The television shorts follow the original anime's Yoshida-kun character as he travels through western Japan's Shimane Prefecture, his birthplace, in the past. The opening season starts out with a modern Yoshida-kun looking at a photo album with Chancellor as the former recounts his youth including how he and Phillip met (as they were best friends before the start of the franchise and why Phillip so easily joined the organization). Each episode of the Shimane sightseeing guide program introduce one famous place in the prefecture. The anime concludes back in current time with the Chancellor completely shocked at Yoshida-kun's story. (Source: ANN edited)

details.Japanese: 秘密結社鷹の爪外伝 むかしの吉田くん

title: Guskou Budori no Denki (2012)
synopsis: The fairy tale follows a young man named Budori Gusuko in the Tohoku forests of northeastern Japan in the 1920s. After an onslaught of droughts and natural disasters, Budori is forced to leave his home and search for a better life elsewhere. Budori joins a group of scientists at the Ihatov Volcano Department, which deals with the same natural disasters that drove Budori from his home. (Source: ANN)
background: Winner of the Excellence Award on the 16th Japan Media Arts Festival.

details.Synonyms: Gusukobudori no Denki, Biography of Gusuko Budori, The Life of Guskou Budori
details.Japanese: グスコーブドリの伝記

title: Hishoka Drop The Animation
synopsis: A young assistant finds himself surrounded by hot office ladies so he thinks his dearest dream just came true, but soon he realizes that -more than a harem master- he is like the office sexual toy.  (Source: ANN)

details.Japanese: 秘書課ドロップ THE ANIMATION

title: Himesama Gentei!
synopsis: This is the first title by Princess Sugar. Celina is the princess of the prosperous western European country of Mellberg and came to Japan to study at a normal school while concealing her true identity. Since she is a distant relative to Yuu, she ends up living in his house. One day, the princess of the resource-rich country of Marualand, Olivia, was exiled to Japan in a coup d’état. Quickly gaining notice around the town, she was treated like a honored guest. However, Yuu disapproved of her snobby attitude since he had grown accustomed to being around princess Celina. Then, Celina told Olivia not to be near him as he is her most precious person. Not backing down from the challenge, she states that she will make him hers.  (Source: VNDB)

details.Japanese: 姫様限定!

title: Kyonyuu Fantasy
synopsis: An OVA based on the WAFFLE game. The story follows Ryuuto Hende, a soldier with unbelievable luck who was assigned to the province where a succubus is drying out men to death, and the local "first lady", who happens to be sexually frustrated. The H-parts show mostly a big-breasts theme and mutual love/appreciation.

details.Japanese: 巨乳ファンタジー

title: Bible Black: New Testament Recap
synopsis: A summary of episodes 1-6. 1 hour of material cut out but 4 new scenes (7.5 minutes) added.

details.Synonyms: Shin Bible Black - Kanzenban - Restored: Rinne, Bible Black: New Testament Complete Version - Restored: Samsara
details.Japanese: 新バイブルブラック 完全版 「Restored ～輪廻～」

title: Metal Fight Beyblade Zero G
synopsis: Seven years after the Nemesis Crisis, much of the world has been devastated and ruined after the tragic fighting.  As a result, most people lost faith and interest in Beyblading.  Otori Tsubasa, who became leader of the WBBA, made it his life goal to ensure humanity could restore itself, as well as restore the popularity of Beyblading.  He created the Zero-G battling style as a result, and hopes a new generation of bladers will rise up to accept the sport once again.  One of these is a teenager named Zero Kurogane, who aims to become the top blader after having a destined encounter with the hero of the Nemesis Crisis, Ginga Hagane.

details.Japanese: メタルファイト ベイブレード ZEROG

title: Mugen no Ryvius: Illusion
synopsis: Short ONA episodes streamed on the TV Tokyo's and Bandai's official websites.

details.Japanese: 無限のリヴァイアス イリュージョン

title: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
synopsis: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost is the prequel to the highly-anticipated Mass Effect 3 and follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega. Vega leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against a mysterious alien threat known as The Collectors. Stationed at a colony in a remote star system, Vega and his soldiers must protect the civilians from a ruthless invasion determined to capture the population for unknown purposes. Learn more about the Mass Effect universe with an unprecedented glimpse into the haunted past of Mass Effect's newest hero!  (Source: masseffectparagonlost.com)

details.Synonyms: Mass Effect Animation, Mass Effect: Ushinawareta Paragon
details.Japanese: マスエフェクト～失われたパラゴン

title: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama Specials
synopsis: Special releases with the DVDs that takes place before the events of the U-17.

details.English: The Prince of Tennis II Specials
details.Japanese: 新テニスの王子様

title: Lupin III: Lupin Ikka Seizoroi
synopsis: Special included with the Lupin 40th anniversary Blu-ray set. Lupin has invited all of his friends to a villa on a private island. It's the first time they've seen each other for the past five years. Lupin is planning a big surprise while they are all at the villa except Fujiko, Goemon and Jigen find Lupin's behavior to be unusual. They are also curious about who the man in the iron mask is, who is chained up to a wall for the reasons they are about to find out. (Source: ANN)

details.Synonyms: Rupan Sansei: Lupin Ikka Seizoroi, Lupin Family Lineup, Lupin III Master File
details.Japanese: ルパン三世 ルパン一家勢揃い

title: Lupin VIII
synopsis: Pilot of Lupin sequel included with the Lupin 40th anniversary Bluray set. Five generations after Lupin the 3rd, Lupin the 8th plies his trade in an airship that flies above a futuristic Paris. (Source: ANN)

details.Japanese: ルパン8世

title: Shin Hikari Shinwa: Palutena no Kagami
synopsis: Anime shorts of the 3DS game "Kid Icarus: Uprising", known as "Shin Hikari Shinwa: Palutena no Kagami" in Japan. Episode 1 - Thanatos Rising Animation: Production I.G Director: Junichi Fujisaku Episode 2 - Medusa's Revenge Animation: Studio 4°C Director: Kazuto Nakazawa Episode 3 - Palutena's Revolting Dinner Animation: SHAFT Director: Akiyuki Shinbou

details.Synonyms: Thanatos Rising, Medusa's Revenge, Palutena's Revolting Dinner
details.Japanese: 新・光神話 パルテナの鏡

title: Blossom
synopsis: Blossom is a short work of animation set to music. It is dedicated to memory of Japan's 3/11 Tohoku earthquake and tsunami disaster that "reminds us not to forget those who were directly affected."  (Source: Crunchyroll News)

details.Japanese: BLOSSOM

title: Haru wa Kuru
synopsis: A short promotional film for the Johnnie Walker whiskey brand, animated by STUDIO 4°C.

details.Japanese: 春は来る

title: Kyoto Animation: Ajisai-hen
synopsis: Kyoto Animation commercial.

details.Japanese: 京都アニメーションCM「あじさい編」

title: Inazuma Eleven Go: Chrono Stone
synopsis: Inazuma Eleven Go: Chrono Stone is set after the Holy Road Soccer Tournament. The hero of of the moment, Tenma Matsukaze, traveled all over Japan to teach soccer to kids. He returns to Raimon Junior High School after completing his mission, but to his surprise, it's no longer the same Raimon Junior High that he remembers. The soccer club is non-existent, and the members of the champion team in the Holy Road Soccer Tournament have no recollection of taking part in the tournament. They neither remember Tenma nor the game of soccer they loved. As Tenma is baffled by this twist, Alpha, the leader of the Route Agents and captain of Protocol Omega team, suddenly appears before him. Alpha declares that he and his team are responsible for wiping out passion for soccer in Raimon along with the memories of the soccer club members: and Tenma himself is next. That's when a strange boy named Fei Rune appears just in time to save him. Just who is Fei, and why does Alpha want to eliminate soccer for good? Tenma knows that he needs to do everything in his power to emerge victorious. It's a battle that could seal the fate of soccer forever.
background: The series won the 2012 Animage's Anime Grand Prix Award.

details.Japanese: イナズマイレブンGO クロノ・ストーン

title: Fate/Zero: Onegai! Einzbern Soudanshitsu
synopsis: Written by Kinoko Nasu, these specials are included in the BD box sets I & II. Join Irisviel as she helps Disciple No. Zero understand more details and history relating to the Holy Grail War.

details.Synonyms: Fate/Zero Specials, Please! Einzbern Consultation Room
details.Japanese: お願い!アインツベルン相談室

title: Shinryaku!! Ika Musume
synopsis: Original anime DVD bundled with the 12th, 14th, and 17th volumes of the manga.

details.Synonyms: Shinryaku! Ika Musume OAD, The Invader Comes From the Bottom of the Sea! OVA, Shinryaku! Ika Musume OVA, Squid Girl OVA
details.Japanese: 侵略!!イカ娘

title: Hunter x Hunter Movie 1: Phantom Rouge
synopsis: After completing their work at Yorknew City, Leorio Paladiknight and Kurapika investigate the rumored sightings of a boy with scarlet red eyes, as they believe this person to be a member of the now non-existent Kurta Clan. Kurapika hopes to find another survivor of the clan besides himself, but instead ends up losing both his eyes after an attack from someone who seems to be his childhood friend.  Leorio tends to Kurapika's wounds, and then sends for both Gon Freecss and Killua Zoldyck to help retrieve Kurapika's eyeballs. However, their search brings them face-to-face with the infamous group of thieves known as Phantom Troupe—the same people who massacred the entire Kurta Clan five years ago for their scarlet eyes, which change color during moments of rage. Hunter x Hunter Movie 1: Phantom Rouge follows the boys' quest to locate their friend's eyes and catch the thief, causing them to delve deep into Phantom Troupe's past. And in doing so, they encounter a mysterious girl who appears to be linked to it all…

details.Synonyms: Gekijouban Hunter x Hunter: Hiiro no Genei, HxH Movie
details.Japanese: 劇場版 HUNTER×HUNTER 緋色の幻影（ファントム・ルージュ）

title: FlashBack
synopsis: Music video from Akane Aki.

details.Japanese: FlashBack

title: One Off
synopsis: A slice of life of high school girls in the early summer. Shiozaki Haruno is a 17-year-old girl who loves her motor cycle, HONDA's Giorno. She lives in remote highlands and longs for a vivid life in a city.  Encounters with people staying at Haruno's parents' boardinghouse encourage her to step forward to her dream.

details.Japanese: わんおふ -one off-

title: Galaxy Angel Specials
synopsis: VHS/DVD only episodes 21 and 26.

details.Synonyms: Galaxy Angel: Sukiyaki Bentou Goninmae, Galaxy Angel Episode 21 and 26

title: Houkago no Tinker Bell
synopsis: Based on a story from the After School Series line of light novels. Kenichi Akizuki and Misako Watanabe work together to solve the mysterious disappearance of their classmate Ryouko Miyazaki.  The only clue left by the kidnapper is signed Koushin Okazaki, her late classmate who'd committed suicide to preserve his youth and become like Peter Pan.

details.Synonyms: After School Series: Tinker Bell, Tinkerbell After School
details.Japanese: 放課後のティンカー・ベル
